stimulusHtml: Which of the following best describes an example of a harmful effect of an invasive species on biodiversity?
choicesHtml: Invasive zebra mussels increase the population size of several native mollusks in a lake ecosystem.
Asian carp outcompete native fish species in rivers in the United States.
Polar bears prey on ringed and bearded seals in an Arctic ecosystem.
Wind-blown seeds from a grass species colonize a new volcanic island in the Pacific Ocean.
